descriptions.quality: At FlexiFun we offer high-quality 3D printing on Bambu Lab printers – cutting-edge equipment with accuracy up to 0.1 mm. Our team of professionals has years of experience in developing and manufacturing complex functional models, mechanisms, and unique products from eco-friendly PLA and other materials.
descriptions.variety: We specialize in projects of any complexity – from simple figurines to complex mechanisms, prototypes, and serial production up to 10,000 units. Speed, quality, and creativity – these are our main advantages.

printer.features: Speed • Accuracy up to 0.1 mm • High quality • Reliability

products.subheader: Choose the category that best suits your needs

calculator.subheader: Upload your file and calculate the exact cost

upload.header: Drag and drop your 3D model or click "Choose File"

notifications.large: File is too large. Maximum size: 50 MB

printers.description: We use cutting-edge Bambu Lab 3D printers, which provide high accuracy up to 0.1 mm and printing speed up to 500 mm/s. This allows us to create quality parts with sharp contours and smooth surfaces, guaranteeing perfect execution even for the smallest elements.

hero.heroSubtitle: Educational kits, functional mechanisms, and unique decor
hero.heroDescription: Ready-made products and print-on-demand – from simple toys to industrial orders

ecology.ecologyDescription: We use only high-quality PLA plastic, which is biodegradable and free of harmful substances
ecology.ecologyDescription2: Safe for children, safe for the planet

educationalSets.title: Educational kits
educationalSets.description: Scientifically designed sets for harmonious child development through play and practical tasks

playSets.title: Play sets and entertainment
playSets.description: Unique 3D toys, moving mechanisms, puzzles, and building sets

decorSets.title: Decor and gifts
decorSets.description: Original 3D decorations and special gifts with personalization options

usefulSets.title: Useful accessories
usefulSets.description: Practical 3D solutions for home and everyday use — holders, organizers, and stands

description.first: We use quality materials: PLA, PETG, and other types of plastic for any task.
description.second: We bring concepts to life, from simple figurines to complex functional mechanisms.

firstItem.title: Moving Toys and Mechanisms
firstItem.description:
We print toys of any type: from simple figurines to complex moving mechanisms, board games, and building sets.
We create unique play solutions that are not mass-produced.

secondItem.title: Personalized Gifts
secondItem.description:
We create unique personalized gifts with names, dates, and personal messages.
Exclusive souvenirs that preserve special life moments.

thirdItem.title: Functional Parts
thirdItem.description:
We manufacture precise functional parts for household, technical, and creative needs.
From reproducing broken components to creating new engineering solutions with high accuracy and strength.

fourthItem.title: Small Batches
fourthItem.description:
Professional production of series from 1 to 5000 units for business and marketing.
Corporate souvenirs, exclusive products, and prototypes with guaranteed quality of each item.

secondItem.title: Quality
secondItem.description: High print accuracy up to 0.1 mm

filtersSection.title: Decor & Gifts
filtersSection.description: Unique 3D-printed decorative elements and gifts. From functional stands to elegant interior decorations. Each item can be personalized according to your wishes by adding names, inscriptions, or changing dimensions.

hero.title: FlexiFun Educational Sets
hero.description: Scientifically designed kits for the harmonious development of children. Each set is created to develop specific skills through play and practical tasks. Safe materials and innovative methods are used.

firstCard.title: Animal World
firstCard.subtitle: Savanna Edition
firstCard.description: Explore the world of savanna animals with your child:

list.itemFirst: Learn about 15 different animals and their habitats

secondCard.title: Basic Board & Memory Case
secondCard.subtitle: Memory Development
secondCard.description: Train memory and concentration through play:

list.itemThird: Interactive trainer with multiple difficulty levels

thirdCard.title: 4 Gears Fidget Spinner
thirdCard.subtitle: Motor Skills Development
thirdCard.description: Develop fine motor skills and concentration:

list.itemFirst: Finger muscle training through mechanical exercises
list.itemThird: Exercise system developed by child neurologists

fourthCard.title: FlexiFun Robot
fourthCard.subtitle: Programming & Robotics
fourthCard.description: A first step into programming and robotics:

list.itemSecond: Assemble a working robot by yourself

previewSection.description: Elegant incense stick holder made of high-quality PLA plastic. Suitable for all standard incense sticks. Available in various colors.

descriptions.first: Our incense stick holder is not only a functional item but also an elegant decor piece for your interior.
descriptions.second: Made from eco-friendly PLA plastic, it is safe to use in living spaces and does not emit harmful substances.
descriptions.third: The holder has a special design that ensures stability and safe use of incense sticks. It is easy to clean and retains its qualities over time. Available in various colors to match your interior perfectly.
descriptions.forth: We use high-precision Bambu Lab 3D printers to produce the holder, ensuring ideal manufacturing quality and precise details.

newsletter.information: Get information about new products and promotions
